```{r}
#| label: libraries
#| include: false

library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(corrr)
```

```{r}
here("posts", "big_five", "IPIP-FFM-data-8Nov2018.zip") |>
  unzip("IPIP-FFM-data-8Nov2018/data-final.csv") |>
  read_tsv(na = "NULL", col_select = 1:50) ->
  big_five_data
```

```{r}
big_five_data |>
  slice_sample(prop = .01) |>
  mutate(across(everything(), str_trim)) |>
  correlate() |>
  autoplot(method = "Identity",low = "#2166ac") +
  labs(title = "Correlation Plot of Big Five Survey Items")
```
